data.title: Exit: The Return to the Abandoned Cabin
data.meta_description: The games in the "Exit: The Return to the Abandoned Cabine" series are challenging cooperative board games based on "escape room" mechanics, where players must solve various tasks together to find solutions to puzzles and escape from difficult situations. Enter the largest board game store in the Baltics, easy and fast delivery.
data.text:
EXIT The Game: The Return to the Abandoned Cabin is a sequel to Exit: The Game - The Abandoned Cabin with many new puzzles and tools.

On an ordinary morning, a police detective knocks on your door. He asks you to come with him - to a cabin in the woods. You immediately realize that it is the same cabin that the evil riddle master Dr. Arthur Funback imprisoned you in a few years ago. Apparently he just escaped from prison. Now you head back to the infamous cabin where it all started to help Funbeq down. The adventure beginsâ€¦ all over again!

Celebrating 5 years since the original Exit game The Abandoned Cabin!

EXiT: The Game series of games are challenging cooperative board games based on escape room mechanics where players must solve various tasks together to find the solution to the puzzles and get out of difficult situations.

Board game " EXiT: The Game - Cemetery of the Knight" consists of 1 scenario.

WARNING: The game can be played once, as the gameplay may break game elements, and there will be a known workaround.

Difficulty:3/5

Age: from 12 years

Duration: 60 - 120 min

Number of players: 1 - 4
